category: Gyeonggi player registration regulations/Article 10 (Approval of registration)
contents: Article 10 (Registration Approval) ① The city/provincial sports organization that has received the application for athlete registration shall review the registration applicant's reasons for disqualification as athlete under Article 14 and request approval from the member sports organization within 15 days from the registration application date. However, if the applicant has grounds for disqualification, the city/provincial sports organization must reject approval and notify the applicant. If the athlete has no grounds for disqualification and does not request approval even after 15 days from the date of application for registration, the approval request will be made. It is considered to be ② The member sport organization approves the registration of the applicant as an athlete within 15 days from the date of request for approval and notifies the national federation as necessary. However, if the member sport organization does not approve even after 15 days from the date of request for approval even though the athlete has no grounds for disqualification, it is deemed to have been approved.
